ProteinName	Uroplakin-2 (UP2) (Uroplakin II) (UPII)
GeneName	UPK2
Length	184
Function	Component of the asymmetric unit membrane (AUM); a highly specialized biomembrane elaborated by terminally differentiated urothelial cells. May play an important role in regulating the assembly of the AUM (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Cell membrane
